Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<<> AzureBlade: I swear it upon the honor of my spark. You must be 
> wondering where you are, right? Or what I am doing here?>>

His spark...

Mistra was confused by much of this, although she knew the value of a spark. 
In response, her wings eased the rest of the way, settling flat upon her back 
as before. She would trust him, and just have to hope she wouldn't regret it. 
Or that her confusion would be taken advantage of just to win her to his 
side...then again, how was she to be sure that wasn't her own side as well? 

With a slow nod, she replied "Yes..."

--part1_f7.15f3f8b0.2991e8e3_boundary
